element.definition: Does the patient have a history of being an organ transplant recipient? Which transplantation was performed?
Does the patient suffer from diabetes? Which type of diabetes does the patient suffer from?
Does the patient suffer from at least one active tumour/cancer disease?
Has the patient ever smoked cigarettes?
Does the patient suffer from at least one chronic neurological disease or psychiatric illness? Which one?
Did an oxygen or respiratory therapy already exist before the current illness?

code.display: Canadian Study of Health and Aging Clinical Frailty Scale score (observable entity)

element.short: Contact with persons suffering from COVID-19
element.definition: Did the patient knowingly have contact with a person with probable or proven COVID-19 disease within 14 days before the onset of his/her symptoms?
Complications in the context of Covid-19

code.display: Disease stage score for risk calculation

element.definition: Stage of illness at the time of COVID-19 diagnosis

code.display: SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) RNA [Presence] in Respiratory specimen by NAA with probe detection
SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) Ab [Presence] in Serum or Plasma by Immunoassay

element.definition: Qualitative detection of SARS-CoV-2 antibodies by an immunoassay method.

code.display: SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) Ab [Units/volume] in Serum or Plasma by Immunoassay

element.definition: Quantitative detection of any SARS-CoV-2 antibodies (IgG, IgM, or IgA) in serum or plasma by immunoassay methods.

code.display: SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) IgG Ab [Presence] in Serum or Plasma by Immunoassay

element.definition: Detection of SARS-CoV-2 IgG antibodies by an immunoassay method.

code.display: SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) IgG Ab [Units/volume] in Serum or Plasma by Immunoassay

element.definition: Quantitative results for detection of IgG antibodies against SARS coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2) in serum or plasma by immunoassay methods.

code.display: SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) IgM Ab [Presence] in Serum or Plasma by Immunoassay

element.definition: Detection of SARS-CoV-2 IgM antibodies by an immunoassay method.

code.display: SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) IgM Ab [Units/volume] in Serum or Plasma by Immunoassay

element.definition: Quantitative results for detection of IgM antibodies against SARS coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2) in serum or plasma by immunoassay methods.

code.display: SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) IgA Ab [Presence] in Serum or Plasma by Immunoassay

element.definition: Detection of SARS-CoV-2 IgA antibodies by an immunoassay method.

code.display: SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) IgA Ab [Units/volume] in Serum or Plasma by Immunoassay

element.definition: Quantitative results for detection of IgA antibodies against SARS coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2) in serum or plasma by immunoassay methods.
